atk-s0402a31:2_3: Tattha kira bhūtabalikaraṇatthaṁ baliṁ haranti, tasmā baliharaṇanti vuccati. Ākaṅkhamānoti icchamāno. Sahatthāti sahatthena.
atk-s0402a31:2_4: Sampavāretīti alaṁ alanti vācāya ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:2_5: Sādhu vata māyanti sādhu vata maṁ ayaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:2_9: Anissaraṇapaññoti chandarāgaṁ pahāya saṁkaḍḍhitvā paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti, ayaṁ na tādiso,
atk-s0402a31:6_2: Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṁ vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye, kadāci sārandade, kadāci bahuputte,
atk-s0402a31:6_3: kadāci gotamaketi evaṁ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi.
atk-s0402a31:6_4: Imasmiṁ pana kāle vesāliṁ upanissāya gotamakassa yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi.
atk-s0402a31:7_0: Idañca bhagavatā suttaṁ atthuppattiyaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ. Kataraatthuppattiyanti?
atk-s0402a31:7_2: Sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā attanā uggahitabuddhavacanaṁ nissāya jānanamadaṁ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṁ na gacchanti – ‘‘sammāsambuddho kathento amhehi ñātameva kathessati, no aññāta’’nti.
atk-s0402a31:7_4: Satthā te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṁ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṁ desesi.
atk-s0402a31:7_5: Te bhikkhū desanāya neva āgataṭṭhānaṁ, na gataṭṭhānaṁ addasaṁsu.
atk-s0402a31:7_6: Apassantā ‘‘sammāsambuddho ‘mayhaṁ kathā niyyātī’ti mukhasampattameva kathetī’’ti cintayiṁsu.
atk-s0402a31:7_7: Satthā tesaṁ manaṁ jānitvā imaṁ suttantaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a31:8_0: Tattha abhiññāyāti ‘‘ime pañcakkhandhā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, bāvīsatindriyāni, cattāri saccāni, nava hetū, satta phassā, satta vedanā, satta cetanā, satta saññā,
atk-s0402a31:8_1: satta cittānī’’ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṁ katvā,
atk-s0402a31:8_2: tathā – ‘‘ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho.
atk-s0402a31:8_3: Sanidānanti sappaccayameva katvā kathemi, no appaccayaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_4: Sappāṭihāriyanti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇena sappāṭihāriyameva katvā kathemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_5: Alañca pana voti yuttañca pana tumhākaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:8_7: suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṁ tumhākaṁ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṁ kātunti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a31:9_2: Bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṁ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0402a31:9_4: Pacchimadisaṁ gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0402a31:9_6: Uttaradisaṁ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a31:9_8: Pācīnadisaṁ gate pācīnadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a31:9_10: Bodhirukkhopi sakiṁ heṭṭhā avīciṁ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a31:9_12: Tasmimpi divase evaṁ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.
atk-s0402a31:11_3: Ayaṁ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṁ aggapiṇḍaṁ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0402a31:11_4: Tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā bhagavā evaṁ adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0402a31:11_5: yathā añño āvasatho na paññāyittha. Tasmā na addasa.
atk-s0402a31:11_7: So kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṁyeva assame ahosi, taṁ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a31:11_10: Kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññāpetīti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo,
atk-s0402a31:11_12: Na rūpānaṁ pariññanti rūpānaṁ samatikkamabhūtaṁ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṁ na paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a31:11_13: Na vedanānaṁ pariññanti vedanānaṁ samatikkamaṁ nibbānaṁ na paññāpeti. Niṭṭhāti gati nipphatti. Udāhu puthūti udāhu nānā.
atk-s0402a31:13_1: Pañcame abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu dissati. Tattha ‘‘abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṅgho, uddisatu, bhante,
atk-s0402a31:13_2: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ pātimokkha’’nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0402a31:13_3: ‘‘Ayaṁ imesaṁ catunnaṁ puggalānaṁ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā’’ti evamādīsu (a. ni. 4.100) sundare.
atk-s0402a31:14_0: ‘‘Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṁ;
atk-s0402a31:15_0: Abhikkantena vaṇṇena, sabbā obhāsayaṁ disā’’ti. (vi. va. 857) –
atk-s0402a31:16_1: bho gotamā’’ti evamādīsu (pārā. 15) abbhanumodane. Idha pana sundare.
atk-s0402a31:16_2: Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0402a31:16_5: Tattha ‘‘suvaṇṇavaṇṇosi bhagavā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 2.399; su. ni. 553) chaviyaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:16_6: ‘‘Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 2.77) thutiyaṁ. ‘‘Cattārome, bho gotama, vaṇṇā’’ti evamādīsu (dī. ni. 3.115) kulavagge. ‘‘Atha kena nu vaṇṇena,
atk-s0402a31:16_10: ‘‘Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā’’ti evamādīsu rūpāyatane. So idha chaviyā daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a31:17_1: Tathā hissa ‘‘kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariya’’nti evamādīsu (pārā. 1) anavasesatā attho.
atk-s0402a31:17_2: ‘‘Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī’’ti evamādīsu (mahāva. 43) yebhuyyatā.
atk-s0402a31:17_4: ‘‘Kevalaṁ saddhāmattakaṁ nūna ayamāyasmā’’ti evamādīsu (mahāva. 244) anatirekatā. ‘‘Āyasmato, bhante,
atk-s0402a31:17_5: anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṁ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito’’ti evamādīsu (a. ni. 4.243) daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0402a31:17_6: ‘‘Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.57) visaṁyogo.
atk-s0402a31:18_2: yathā taṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 1.387) abhisaddahanamattho. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0402a31:18_3: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṁ paribhuñjitu’’nti evamādīsu (cūḷava. 250) vohāro.
atk-s0402a31:18_4: ‘‘Yena sudaṁ niccakappaṁ viharāmī’’ti evamādīsu (ma. ni. 1.387) kālo.
atk-s0402a31:18_12: Tasmā kevalakappaṁ jetavananti ettha anavasesaṁ samantato jetavananti attho.
atk-s0402a31:19_0: Obhāsetvāti ābhāya pharitvā. Vālukāyāti saṇhāya vālukāya. Na saṇṭhātīti na patiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a31:19_1: Oḷārikanti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṁ vaṭṭati pathavī vā, tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0402a31:19_3: Nappavattino ahesunti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṁ.
atk-s0402a31:20_1: Upaṭṭhānassāti catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhānassa. Adhisīlanti dasavidhaṁ sīlaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:22_1: Chaṭṭhe goyogapilakkhasminti gāvīnaṁ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike.
atk-s0402a31:22_4: Āmagandhenāti kodhasaṅkhātena vissagandhena. Avassutanti tintaṁ. Makkhikāti kilesamakkhikā.
atk-s0402a31:23_0: Kaṭuviyakatoti ucchiṭṭhakato. Ārakā hotīti dūre hoti.
atk-s0402a31:23_1: Vighātasseva bhāgavāti dukkhasseva bhāgī. Caretīti carati gacchati. Dummedhoti duppañño.
atk-s0402a31:23_3: gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṁ kathitanti. Sattame vaṭṭameva bhāsitaṁ.
atk-s0402a31:25_1: Aṭṭhame idaṁ te mānasminti ayaṁ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho.
atk-s0402a31:25_2: Idaṁ te uddhaccasminti idaṁ tava uddhaccaṁ cittassa uddhatabhāvo.
atk-s0402a31:27_2: Vivaṭo virocatīti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a31:29_3: Gāḷhaṁ katvā pharusaṁ katvā vuccamānopīti attho.
atk-s0402a31:29_7: Sammodatimevāti ekībhāvameva gacchati. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
